name: Salmon
description: As you bite into the salmon, you feel like you're dining in a fancy riverside restaurant.

name: Trout
description: The trout tastes fresh, but you can't shake the feeling it was judging you as you caught it.

name: Bass
description: The bass has a hearty flavor, and you feel a sense of accomplishment for reeling it in.

name: Catfish
description: The catfish tastes earthy, and you wonder if it was plotting revenge from the riverbed.

name: Tuna
description: The tuna is rich and meaty, making you feel like a sushi chef in training.

name: Shark
description: As you bite into the shark, you feel a surge of power, as if you’ve conquered the ocean itself.

name: Goldfish
description: The goldfish tastes like regret and childhood memories of carnival games.

name: Piranha
description: The piranha bites back as you eat it, but its spicy flavor is worth the risk.

name: Swordfish
description: The swordfish tastes sharp and refined, like it was forged in the fires of the sea.

name: Mackerel
description: The mackerel is light and flaky, but you feel like it’s judging your life choices.

name: Eel
description: The eel tastes electric, sending a jolt of energy through your body.

name: Carp
description: The carp tastes plain, but you feel a strange sense of calm as you eat it.

name: Sturgeon
description: The sturgeon tastes luxurious, and you wonder if you should have saved it for caviar.

name: Barracuda
description: The barracuda tastes fierce, and you feel like you’ve unlocked a new level of danger.

name: Marlin
description: The marlin tastes like adventure, and you imagine yourself as a deep-sea explorer.

name: Anchovy
description: The anchovy is salty and bold, perfect for pizza or questionable culinary experiments.

name: Herring
description: The herring tastes smoky, and you feel like you’re at a Nordic feast.

name: Snapper
description: The snapper tastes vibrant, like a tropical vacation in every bite.

name: Grouper
description: The grouper tastes hearty, and you feel like you’ve earned a fisherman’s badge of honor.

name: Halibut
description: The halibut tastes delicate, and you feel like you’re dining in a five-star restaurant.

name: Bluefin Tuna
description: The bluefin tuna tastes exquisite, and you feel like royalty with every bite.

name: Whale Shark
description: As you bite into the whale shark, you feel a pang of guilt for eating such a gentle giant.

name: Kraken
description: The kraken tastes otherworldly, and you feel like you’ve angered the gods of the sea.

name: Leviathan
description: The leviathan tastes ancient, and you feel like you’ve unlocked a forbidden secret.

name: Sea Serpent
description: The sea serpent tastes fiery, and you feel like you’ve tamed a beast of legend.

name: Phoenix Fish
description: The phoenix fish reignites your spirit with every bite, leaving a warm glow in your chest.

name: Dragonfish
description: The dragonfish tastes smoky and powerful, as if it was cooked by dragon fire.

name: Celestial Koi
description: The celestial koi tastes divine, and you feel like you’ve touched the heavens.

name: Abyssal Angler
description: The abyssal angler tastes dark and mysterious, like a secret from the ocean depths.

name: Loch Ness Monster
description: As you sink your teeth into the Loch Ness Monster, you look up and it says “Could I borrow about tree fitty?”

name: Bravo Case
description: An old barnacle-laden Bravo case.
